mapper.insert: insert into sys_log ( member_id, member_name, content, operation, type, exception, request_url, remote_addr, create_time )values ( trim(#{memberId}), trim(#{memberName}), trim(#{content}), trim(#{operation}), trim(#{type}), trim(#{exception}), trim(#{requestUrl}), trim(#{remoteAddr}), sysdate() )
